info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Elkhart, southeastern St. Joseph, northern Kosciusko and northeastern Marshall Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bremen, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nappanee and Wakarusa around 410 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Milford, Goshen, New Paris and Syracuse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
